argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rrhval.1 | |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 2 |  | rrhval.2 | |- K = ( TopOpen ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elex | |- ( R e. V -> R e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = J |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( r = R -> ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = J ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( TopOpen ` r ) = ( TopOpen ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( TopOpen ` r ) = K ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) CnExt ( TopOpen ` r ) ) = ( J CnExt K ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( QQHom ` r ) = ( QQHom ` R ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) CnExt ( TopOpen ` r ) ) ` ( QQHom ` r ) ) = ( ( J CnExt K ) ` ( QQHom ` R ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-rrh | |- RRHom = ( r e. _V |-> ( ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) CnExt ( TopOpen ` r ) ) ` ( QQHom ` r ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( J CnExt K ) ` ( QQHom ` R ) ) e. _V |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( R e. _V -> ( RRHom ` R ) = ( ( J CnExt K ) ` ( QQHom ` R ) ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. V -> ( RRHom ` R ) = ( ( J CnExt K ) ` ( QQHom ` R ) ) ) |
